abstract: The $10 million settlement resolves claims that Ernst helped Lehman engineer an accounting fraud in the months before its 2008 bankruptcy filing.
snippet: The $10 million settlement resolves claims that Ernst helped Lehman engineer an accounting fraud in the months before its 2008 bankruptcy filing.
lead_paragraph: Another loose end stemming from the collapse of Lehman Brothers was wrapped up on Wednesday as Ernst & Young agreed to pay $10 million to settle a four-year-old lawsuit brought by New York State authorities.

headline.main: Ernst & Young in Settlement Over Lehman Brothers
headline.print_headline: Ernst & Young in Settlement Over Lehman Brothers
